SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractSignerResult<T>
Abstract base class for SignerResult implementations.
AdesProfileType
An enumeration representing the different ETSI AdES types.
AssertThat
Utility class that helps us make assertions, for example when checking that all required properties have been assigned.
CertificateUtils
Utilities for handling X.509 certificates.
CertificateValidationResult
Interface representing the successful result of a signature validation operation.
CertificateValidator
An interface for verifying a certificate up until a trusted root.
DefaultCertificateValidationResult
Default implementation of the SignatureValidationResult interface.
DefaultSignatureValidationResult
Default implementation of the SignatureValidationResult interface.
DOMUtils
Utilities for processing DOM documents.
DSSStatusCodes
Contains the DSS status codes along with the Sweden Connect extensions.
InternalSignatureValidationException
Exception that may be used internally by implementations of the SignatureValidator interface.
Pair<T1,T2>
Representation of a Pair.
ProtocolVersion
A representation of a protocol version.
SignatureValidationResult
Interface representing the (successful) result of a signature validation operation.
SignatureValidationResult.Status
Representation of the validation status of a signature.
SignatureValidator<T>
Generic interface representing a signature validator instance that supports validating documents having one more signatures.
Signer<T,R,P>
Interface that represents a signer, i.e. an instance that given a set of signature properties signs documents.
SignerParameters
Marker interface for signer parameters for the Signer interface.
SignerResult<T>
Representation of the result to an Signer.sign(Object) invocation.
SimpleCertificateValidator
A simple validator that does not perform revocation checking and only relies upon the supplied certificates when building the chain.
StaticCredentials
Utility class that holds pre-generated key pairs.
VoidSignerParameters
Instance of a void SignerParameters instance.
